meanings.definition: To climb or ascend onto something
meanings.sent1: The brave knight mounted his horse before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: She mounted the ladder carefully to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat mounted the fence to get a better view of the garden.
meanings.sent4: With determination, he mounted the steep hill, eager to reach the summit.
meanings.sent5: The young climber mounted the rock wall with skill and agility.

meanings.definition: To fix or attach something to a support
meanings.sent1: He mounted the TV on the wall to save space in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter mounted the shelves securely to the wall.
meanings.sent3: She mounted the painting on the wall, making sure it was straight.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic mounted the new tires onto the car with precision.
meanings.sent5: They mounted the mirror on the door to check their outfit before leaving.

meanings.definition: To organize or set up an event or exhibition
meanings.sent1: The team mounted a successful charity event to raise funds for the shelter.
meanings.sent2: She mounted an art exhibition showcasing local talent.
meanings.sent3: They mounted a surprise party for their friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The school mounted a play with students taking on various roles.
meanings.sent5: He mounted a book fair to promote reading among children.

meanings.definition: To ride a horse or other animal
meanings.sent1: The cowboy mounted his horse and rode off into the sunset.
meanings.sent2: She mounted the elephant for a thrilling ride through the jungle.
meanings.sent3: He mounted the camel for a desert adventure.
meanings.sent4: They mounted the ponies for a leisurely ride around the ranch.
meanings.sent5: The knight mounted his trusty steed before jousting in the tournament.

meanings.definition: To be placed or situated in a higher position
meanings.sent1: The castle was mounted on a hill overlooking the village.
meanings.sent2: The statue was mounted on a pedestal in the town square.
meanings.sent3: The flag was mounted on top of the pole to flutter in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The painting was mounted on the wall above the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The clock was mounted high on the tower for all to see.
